title: Stepped copper sites coupling voltage-induced surfactant assembly to achieve efficient CO2 electroreduction to formate
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02697G, Paper
Sicong Qiao, Guikai Zhang, Dong Tian, Wenjie Xu, Wei Jiang, Yuyang Cao, Jun Qian, Jing Zhang, Qun He, Li Song
Ligand modification for electrochemically formed stepped Cu sites can achieve higher formate selectivity during CO2 reduction. This study highlights the synergy of ligand effect and catalyst reconstruction at atomic and molecular levels.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
